lead_paragraph: Zinedine Zidane promises to make up for his lack of coaching experience by inspiring Real Madrid to play with the same attacking flair he displayed during his playing career.

headline.print_headline: Zidane Pledges to Restore Madrid's Attacking Prowess
headline.main: Zidane Pledges to Restore Madrid's Attacking Prowess

snippet: Zinedine Zidane promises to make up for his lack of coaching experience by inspiring Real Madrid to play with the same attacking flair he displayed during his playing career....
